text: Franz Waxman (ne Washsmann; December 24, 1906 - February 24, 1967) is a German-born composer and conductor of Jewish descent, known primarily for his work in the film music genre. == References == == Other websites == *Official website * Category:1906 births Category:1967 deaths Category:20th-century German composers Category:Jewish German musicians Category:Movie score composers
title: Franz Waxman
